coded_answer.p: THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR LETTER YOU SENT ME LAST WEEK. I'M VERY PROUD TO BE THE WINNER OF YOUR COMPETITION! I HAVE NEVER BEEN INTO SUCH A CAMP BEFORE AND SO I'M LOOKING FORWARTFORWARD TO SPENDING TWO WEEKS THERE. HERE AREIS THE INFORMATION YOU ASKED FOR:

IT IS ONLY POSSIBLE FOR ME TO TRAVEL IN JULY BECAUSE OF MY UNREGULARIRREGULAR WORK. IN JULY WE HAVE GOTJULY IS THE LOW SEASON AND IT WILL BE EASIER TO GO THEN ON HOLLYDAYHOLIDAYON HOLIDAY THEN. FURTHER I WOULD PREFER A TENTSTENT. I HAVE BEENWAS INAT A SPORTSPORTS CAMP LAST YEAR AND IT WAS FUNNYFUN TO SLEEP IN TENTS.
FROM THE ACTIVITIES I CHOOSE TENNIS AND SURFING. I PLAYHAVE PLAYED TENNIS IN A CUPCHAMPIONSHIP FOR FIVE YEARS BUT SURFING I HAVE NEVER DONE BEFORE.
DO WE NEED SOME SPECIAL SPORTSPORTS CLOTHES FOR THISTHESE TWO ACTIVITIES? AND IS IT ALSOAM I ALLOWED TO BRING MY DOG WITH ME? HE'S A SMALSMALL ONE!
I'M LOOKING FORWARTFORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU
YOU KNOW THAT I ALWAYS WANTED TO HELP AT A CONCERT. TO BE IN APART OF THE STAFF TEAM WOULD BE WONDERFUL, I THOUGTHTHOUGHT. AND I WAS RIGHT! BUT NOW FROM THE BEGINNING:
AS YOU KNOW I WROTE TO THAT ORGANISATION WHOWHICH IS ALWAYS RESPONSBLERESPONSIBLE FOR BIG EVENTS. ONE WEEK LATER THEY INVITED ME TO A POP CONCERT WHICH TOOK PLACE IN ZURICH LAST MONTH.

WHEN I ARRIVED WE FIRST HAD A MEETING. ALL FROMOF THE STAFF TEAM AND THE ORGANISATION SPOKSPOKE ABOUT THE RULES AND HOW TO SAVE PEOPLE. AFTER THE MEETING WE RECIEVEDRECEIVED ALLWE ALL RECEIVED THE SAME CLOTHES. WE WERE A GROUPEGROUP! ONE TEAM! BEFORE THE CONCERT WE HAD A BREAK TO EAT SOMETHING AND TO TALK TO EACH OTHER. IT WAS INTERESTING TO SEE THAT ALL PEOPLE HAVE OTHERDIFFERENT HOBBIES AND WORKJOBS.

THE CONCERT WAS VERRYVERY LOUD AND LONG BUT WE DIDN'T HAVE TO WORK HARD. I WAS HAPPY THAT THERE WAS NO DANGER FOR THE PEOPLE DURING THE CONCERT. AFTER A NICE CONCERT WE HAD TO CLEAN EVERYTHING AND I WAS HAPPY WHEN I ARRIVED AT HOME EARLY IN THE MORNING..!
GREATINGGREETINGS AND HOPE TO SEE YOU SOON
